channel.title: Item's Dropped
channel.description: im using luckscape a 317 as my source, i was woundering how you make items drop that the person you kill in wildy has, example: player 1 has lime whip, player 2 kills player 1 how do you make it so player 2 gets player 1's items? please respond i need help! :|
